PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Knowledge_DB_Interface module¶

class PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Knowledge_DB_Interface.GO_Interface(Filter, Uniprot_Node_IDs, corrfactor, Ultraspec_clean=False, Ultraspec_lvl=3)[source]¶

Bases: object

General calss to recover all the informations associated with GO from database and buffer them for further use.

Parameters:
  • Filter –
  • Uniprot_Node_IDs – A list of hte Uniprots that will be used for the GO reach and informativity computation. Beyond database and formalism issues, this allows to adapt method when limited list of UP is of interest
  • corrfactor –
  • Ultraspec_clean –
  • Ultraspec_lvl – parameter how much uniprots have to point to a GO term for it not to be considered ultraspecific anymore
build_extended_conduction_system(memoized=True, sourced=False, incremental=False, cancellation=True)[source]¶

Builds a conduction matrix that integrates uniprots, in order to allow an easier knowledge flow analysis

Parameters:
  • memoized – if the tensions and individual relation matrices should be stored in the matrix and dumped at the end computation (required for submatrix recomputation)
  • sourced – if true, all the raltions will be looked up and not computed. Useful for the retrieval of subcirculation group, but requires the UP2voltage_and_circ to be pre-filled
  • incremental – if True, all the circulation computation will be added to the existing ones. Usefull for the computation of particularly big systems with intermediate dumps
  • cancellation – divides the final current by #Nodes**2/2, i.e. makes the currents comparable between circulation systems of differnet sizes.
Returns:

adjusted conduction system

filter_out_ultraspecific()[source]¶

Filters out GO terms that are too specific and builds a directed, undirected adjacency maps and laplacian.

format_Node_props(node_current, limit=0.01)[source]¶
get_GO_Reach()[source]¶

Recovers by how many different uniprots each GO term is reached, both in distance-agnostic and distance-specific terms.

get_GO_access()[source]¶

Loads all of the relations between the UNIPROTs and GOs as one giant dictionary

get_GO_structure()[source]¶

Loads all of the relations between the GOs that are generalisation of the seedList GOs and that are withing the types specified in Filtr

get_Laplacians()[source]¶

Recovers the Laplacian (information conductance) matrixes for the GO annotation terms. For weighted laplacian, currently implements a Max-Ent with custom factor as transition price.

Warning:for this method to function, get_GO reach function must be run first.
Warning:accounting for regulatory relation relation between the GO terms is performed if has been done in the adjunction matrix computation

Parameters:include_reg – if True, the regulation set is included into the matrix
Warning:if the parameter above is set to False, get_GO_reach module will be unable to function.

rebuild()[source]¶
set_Uniprot_source(Uniprots)[source]¶

Sets the Uniprots on which the circulation computation routines will be performed by the otehr methods. Avoids passing as argument large lists of parameters.

Parameters:Uniprots – List of node IDs of the uniprots on which we would like to perform current computations
Raises Warning:if the uniprots were not present in the set of GOs for which we built the system or had no GO attached to them
